attributes.action: Regulate car insurers no claims scam
attributes.additional_details:
Car insurers ask for NCD after you have purchased insurance.
Did you know that each insurer has a different system for providing proof of no claims?
Did you know some insurers offer a maximum of 5 years so you may lose a lot of your no claims?
Did you know that insurers can stop your policy or add huge amounts to premiums if they 'do not receive your NCD' within 7-21 days?
Insurers have a Motor insurance database. Why can't this information be held there? Because that would stop greedy insurance companies from profiting by making rules that are almost impossible to follow...
STOP THIS SCAM NOW AND VOTE HERE OR WRITE TO THE OMBUDSMAN IF YOU HAVE BEEN CAUGHT OUT TOO!
